name: First National Corporation
description: First National Corporation is a community-focused financial institution headquartered in Strasburg, Virginia. Established in 1903, the company operates through its wholly-owned subsidiary, First Bank, which provides a comprehensive range of banking and financial services to individuals and businesses across the region. The bank prides itself on offering personalized customer service and a strong commitment to the communities it serves. First National Corporation offers various products, including checking and savings accounts, loans, mortgages, and investment services. The institution focuses on fostering long-term relationships with its customers by providing innovative financial solutions tailored to their needs. With a team of experienced banking professionals, First National aims to enhance the financial well-being of its customers while contributing to local economic development. The corporation emphasizes transparency, integrity, and a customer-centric approach in all its operations. As a community bank, it actively participates in local initiatives and charitable events, demonstrating its dedication to making a positive impact on the communities it serves. In an ever-evolving financial landscape, First National Corporation leverages technology to offer modern banking solutions while maintaining the personal touch that sets it apart from larger institutions. The company is committed to maintaining its status as a trusted partner in the financial journey of its clients.

seo.meta_title: First National Corporation | Community Banking & Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore First National Corporation, a community-focused bank offering personalized financial services. Discover our products and commitment to local communities.

faq.question: What services does First National Corporation offer?
faq.answer: First National Corporation offers personal and business banking services, including checking accounts, savings accounts, loans, and mortgages.

faq.question: Where is First National Corporation headquartered?
faq.answer: First National Corporation is headquartered in Strasburg, Virginia, USA.

faq.question: When was First National Corporation founded?
faq.answer: First National Corporation was founded in 1903.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of First National Corporation?
faq.answer: J. Michael Smith is the CEO of First National Corporation.
